author: jshlee
body:
#### PR description:

- GEM unpacker was causing a crash for very high PU, due to large bx from large PU
- Current GEMDigi bx is not calculated correctly
-- we currently use GEMDigi bx = GEB bx - VFAT bx, but this should always be 0
-- Changed to use GEMDigi bx = int(VFAT bx)
- GEMRawToDigi module - to use same code for lightDQM (used by HW team) 
- link to talk at GEM DPG https://indico.cern.ch/event/924681/contributions/3885771/attachments/2049027/3433933/gemDPG_unpacker_20200602.pdf

#### PR validation:
- validated with runTheMatrix.py 24811.0

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
- no backport needed yet
title: GEM unpacker bug fix and update
